privacypolicy.title: Who we are
privacypolicy.content: At Voron, we are committed to maintaining the trust and confidence of all visitors to our web site. In particular, we want you to know that Voron is not in the business of selling, renting or trading email lists with other companies and businesses for marketing purposes. In this Privacy Policy, we/’ve provided detailed information on when and why we collect personal information, how we use it, the limited conditions under which we may disclose it to others, and how we keep it secure. We take your privacy seriously and take measures to provide all visitors and users of Voron with a safe and secure environment.

privacypolicy.title: Cookies
privacypolicy.content: Voron may set and access Voron cookies on your computer. Cookies are used to provide our system with the basic information to provide the services you are requesting. Cookies can be cleared at any time from your internet browser settings.

privacypolicy.title: Website Comments
privacypolicy.content: When someone visits Voron, there may be an ability to submit comments on particular articles or pages. When comments are submitted, you are entitled to use aliases or information that completely hides your identity. When a comment is submitted, the relevant details (name, email, website) that you provide are stored.  These details are stored so that we can display your comment back to you, and to anyone viewing the comment sections on the site. We do not verify information entered nor do we require verification.

privacypolicy.title: Third parties
privacypolicy.content: There may be some circumstances where your IP address, geographic location, and other browser related details may be shared with third party companies. We may share your above mentioned data with following third party companies from time to time.

privacypolicy.title: Access to Your Personal Information
privacypolicy.content: You are entitled to view, amend, or delete the personal information that we hold. Email your request to our data protection officer at voron@djnn.sh and we will work with you to remove any of your personal data we may have.

privacypolicy.title: Changes to Our Privacy Policy
privacypolicy.content: We may make changes to our Privacy Policy in the future, however, the most current version of the policy will govern our processing of your personal data and will always be available to you. If we make a change to this policy that, in our sole discretion, is material, we will notify you by an update or email, where possible. By continuing to access or use our services, you agree to be bound to the terms of our Privacy Policy.
